attributes.additional_details: Redefine the Common Travel Area to exclude the Republic of Ireland. Impose visa restrictions on Irish Citizens entering the UK, e.g. maximum 6 month stay. Apply visa restrictions to all Irish Citizens currently in the UK. Remove all access to welfare benefits and severely restrict ability to puchase land. Establish single points of authorised entry, i.e. one point of entry to Northern Ireland, one to Great Britain, one to the Isle of Man and one to the Channel Islands, for Irish Citizens.
